A version of '''[[Indev 0.31]]''' was released on '''January 4, 2010''', at 21:54 UTC.<ref>{{cite IRC logs|Adura|file=2010-01-04_#minecraft.log|tz=standard|date=January 4, 2010|(16:54:47) <Notch> /indev/ has been updated}}</ref> It was announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 23:06 UTC,<ref name=":0">[[wordofnotch:316961243|New sound engine implemented]] – The Word of Notch, January 5, 2010</ref> by which time the [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100104-2258|next version]] had already been released.
This is the first version released in 2010.

== Additions ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Added new sounds from the Freesound project.<ref name=":0" />

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[File:Hotbar.png|200px]] [[Hotbar]]'''
* Added 99 [[torch]]es to the hotbar.

'''[[Sound]]s'''
* Switched to Paul Lamb's sound engine.<ref name=":0" />

== Bugs ==
'''2 bugs reported'''
* The sound does not work.
* Game freezes when raining on map border.
** It does not happen on east and west borders.
